bg.tu_varna.sit.oop1.utilities

Class CommonUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • bg.tu_varna.sit.oop1.utilities.CommonUtility

  • public class CommonUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    The CommonFunctions class provides utility methods for common operations like checking if a string is a number and parsing string to int or double number.

      • isNumber

        public static boolean isNumber(java.lang.String value)
        Checks if the given string is a numeric.
        Parameters:
        value - The string to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the string is number and false if it is not.

      • intParser

        public static int intParser(java.lang.String value)
        Parses a string into an integer. Throws a NumberFormatException if the string cannot be parsed.
        Parameters:
        value - The string to be parsed.
        Returns:
        The integer value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - If the string is not a valid integer.

      • doubleParser

        public static double doubleParser(java.lang.String value)
        Parses a string into a double. Throws a NumberFormatException if the string cannot be parsed.
        Parameters:
        value - The string to be parsed.
        Returns:
        The double value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - If the string is not a valid double.
